With respect to your two inquiries about my having failed to answer your
check list questionnaire in re membership, dues, etc., I am at a complete
loss. My files show I wrote you February 8 at some length and enclosed
checK list. I*m enclosing a duplicate of iay letter, but have no file copy
of the check list. Please advise.
Best regards.
